page: CE69009: Design And Evaluation Of Transportation

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: CE69009 Design and Evaluation of Transportation Facilities (0-0-3) 2 CreditsData Processing and Graphical Presentation using Mathematical and Statistical Packages, Geometric Design and drawing of various Transportation facilities using softwares, Exercises in Monte Carlo simulation of Traffic Flow. Exercise in EIA, Project Evaluation using HDM-IV software, problems in analysis and design of pavements, Exercises in design of intersections, Problems related to Transportation Planning and airport planning.
